name: DateAndTime_betweenTest
description: Unit tests for the DateAndTime class's between method, which generates a random date between two given dates.

test_cases.name: testBetweenValidRange
test_cases.description: Tests the between method with a valid date range.

test_cases.name: testBetweenEqualDates
test_cases.description: Tests the between method with equal from and to dates.

test_cases.name: testBetweenInvalidRange
test_cases.description: Tests the between method with an invalid date range, expecting an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testBetweenWithBirthdayDates
test_cases.description: Tests the between method with dates generated using the birthday method.

test_cases.name: testBetweenWithFutureDates
test_cases.description: Tests the between method with future dates generated using the future method.

test_cases.name: testBetweenWithPastDates
test_cases.description: Tests the between method with past dates generated using the past method.
